definition: scattered/loose/to come loose/to fall apart/leisurely/powdered medicine
to scatter/to break up (a meeting etc)/to disperse/to disseminate/to dispel/(coll.) to sack
to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth

sentences.english: Wal-Mart’s and Costco’s private labels only use cage-free eggs.
sentences.chinese: 沃爾瑪和科斯克的自有品牌都只使用散養雞蛋。

sentences.english: Cage-free hens generally have two to three times more space per bird than caged hens.
sentences.chinese: 每隻散養母雞擁有的空間通常是雞籠的兩到三倍。

sentences.english: Being un-castrated is one of the highest risk factors for mortality in free-roaming cats.
sentences.chinese: 不閹割，是散養或流浪貓死亡的高危因素。

sentences.english: Buy your eggs, chicken and other meats only from free-range farming.
sentences.chinese: 只從散養養殖農場購買雞蛋，雞肉和其他肉類。

sentences.english: He seems to do better on the range than in the cage.
sentences.chinese: 散養比在籠子裏讓它更舒服。

sentences.english: Davidsson went home for the annual sheep herding, when villagers bring back sheep loosed into hilly pastures the spring before.
sentences.chinese: 當地村民春天時把羊趕到草原散養，入秋再圈回各家。
